ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning

Class CompositeCleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning.TextCleaner
      • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning.CompositeCleaner

  • public class CompositeCleaner
extends TextCleaner

    Text cleaner that calls multiple other cleaners in succession.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<TextCleaner> m_cleaners
      The list of cleaners to call

    • Constructor Summary

      CompositeCleaner(CompositeCleaner c)
      Creates a new copy of a composite cleaner

      Creates a new composite text cleaner from a list of other cleaners.
